title: Similar Font
content:
Hi - does anybody have a suggestion for this (exact) or a similar looking font? Very gratefully, curtze

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023204655/http:/typophile.com/files/font_149.jpg) | 98.75 KB |
author: curtze

comments.content:
It seems to be [Zag Regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023204655/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Zag-Regular), a free font.

--- Tamas Ferencz ---
thanks tamas, i think you're right. can you suggest one that's close but a bit more "balanced"?

I like [Galette](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023204655/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/paragraph/galette/), for me that has a similar feel.

--- Tamas Ferencz ---

FF Din is even better:  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff\_din\_pro\_collection/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023204655/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_din_pro_collection/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff\_din\_pro\_collection/")

PTL Notes or PTL Notes Style:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/primetype/notes/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023204655/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/primetype/notes/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/primetype/notes/")  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/primetype/notes-style/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023204655/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/primetype/notes-style/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/primetype/notes-style/")
